content: The committee would like me to have someone to whom I can direct questions or go to for guidance about the city and its resources; I believe, therefore, that you would be a very good match.
translations: ita:Il comitato esaminatore vuole che io abbia un contatto al quale rivolgere domande o al quale chiedere indicazioni sulla
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
